verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a rare apology by a Trump administration official] , [ARG0: top White House trade adviser Peter Navarro] [V: walked] [ARGM-DIR: back his inflammatory statement over the weekend] [ARG1: that there was a “ special place in hell ” reserved for Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] .

In a rare apology by a Trump administration official , top White House trade adviser Peter Navarro walked back his inflammatory statement over the weekend that there [V: was] [ARG1: a “ special place in hell ” reserved for Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] .
